# The `BinaryCoverageReader` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Reader for the coverage mapping data that is emitted by the frontend and stored in an object file. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::coverage::BinaryCoverageReader</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Reader for the coverage mapping data that is emitted by the frontend and stored in an object file.

Definition at line 164 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/profiledata/include/llvm/profiledata/coverage/coveragemappingreader-h">CoverageMappingReader.h</a>.
